verses.plain: In my distress I cried unto the LORD, and he heard me.

tokens.t: In my distress I cried unto the

verses.plain: Deliver my soul, O LORD, from lying lips, and from a deceitful tongue.
What shall be given unto thee? or what shall be done unto thee, thou false tongue?

tokens.t: What shall be given unto thee? or what shall be done unto thee, thou false tongue?

verses.plain: Sharp arrows of the mighty, with coals of juniper.

tokens.t: Sharp arrows of the mighty, with coals of juniper.

verses.plain: Woe is me, that I sojourn in Mesech, that I dwell in the tents of Kedar!

tokens.t: Woe is me, that I sojourn in Mesech,
I dwell in the tents of Kedar!

verses.plain: My soul hath long dwelt with him that hateth peace.

tokens.t: My soul hath long dwelt with him that hateth peace.

verses.plain: I am for peace: but when I speak, they are for war.

tokens.t: peace: but when I speak, they

footnotes.text: What shall be given…: or, What shall the deceitful tongue give unto thee? or, what shall is profit thee?
Sharp…: or, It is as the sharp arrows of the mighty man, with coals of juniper
for peace: or, a man of peace
